_meta.purpose: Template and checklist for HR_LANG review gate preparation

required_artifacts.purpose: Staff education and committee member briefing materials
review_requirements: Review briefing packet content for accuracy
Assess alignment with approved policy framing
required_artifacts.note: Artifact will be generated in COMM_EVT phase

review_requirements: Review legislative language for legal accuracy
Check for unintended consequences or conflicts
required_artifacts.note: Artifact will be generated in COMM_EVT phase

required_artifacts.purpose: Tactical options for amendments and modifications
required_artifacts.note: Artifact will be generated in COMM_EVT phase

pre_review_preparation: Confirm all three required artifacts have been generated
Verify artifacts are in correct format and location
Check that artifacts reference approved INTRO_EVT artifacts (Policy Framing, Whitepaper)
Ensure artifacts align with approved PRE_CONCEPT direction

approve_if: All artifacts align with approved policy direction
Legislative language is legally sound and compliant
No significant risks or unintended consequences identified
reject_if: Artifacts do not align with approved policy direction
Legal language contains errors or compliance issues
revise_if: Alignment issues can be resolved with edits

required_before_hr_lang.blocks: HR_LANG cannot start until prerequisite satisfied
HR_LANG cannot start until prerequisite satisfied
System must be in COMM_EVT phase before HR_LANG artifacts can be generated

artifact_submission.trigger: Agent generates artifact and submits to HR_LANG gate

reviewer_actions: Review each artifact according to checklist

post_approval.state_advancement: COMM_EVT → FLOOR_EVT (requires additional external event: floor_scheduling)
post_approval.note: HR_LANG approval alone does not advance state; external event also required

blocking_reasons: System not yet in COMM_EVT phase
Required INTRO_EVT artifacts not yet approved
current_phase_status.note: This checklist is prepared for future use when system reaches COMM_EVT phase

disclaimer: This is a review template and checklist only. It does not constitute actual review or approval. Actual review will occur when artifacts are submitted to HR_LANG gate in COMM_EVT phase.
